verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they put \w out|strong="H7971"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* every \w leper|strong="H6879"\w*, and every one that hath an \w issue|strong="H2100"\w*, and whosoever is \w defiled|strong="H2931"\w* by the \w dead|strong="H5315"\w*:

Both \w male|strong="H2145"\w* and \w female|strong="H5347"\w* shall ye put \w out|strong="H7971"\w*, \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* shall ye \w put|strong="H7971"\w* them; that they \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* not their \w camps|strong="H4264"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w whereof|strong="H0834"\w* I \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* did \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, and put them \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*: as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, When a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* or \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* shall \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* any \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* that \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w commit|strong="H4603"\w*, to do a \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and that \w person|strong="H5315"\w* be \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*;

Then they shall \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* which they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: and he shall \w recompense|strong="H7725"\w* his \w trespass|strong="H0817"\w* with the \w principal|strong="H7218"\w* thereof, and \w add|strong="H3254"\w* unto it the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \add part\add* thereof, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* unto \add him\add* against whom he hath \w trespassed|strong="H0816"\w*.

But if the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* have no \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* to \w recompense|strong="H7725"\w* the \w trespass|strong="H0817"\w* unto, let the \w trespass|strong="H0817"\w* be \w recompensed|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add even\add* to the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*; beside the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w atonement|strong="H3725"\w*, whereby an atonement shall be \w made|strong="H3722"\w* for him.

And every \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of all the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which they \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, shall be his.\f + \fr 5.9 \ft offering: or, heave offering\f*

And every \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* hallowed \w things|strong="H6944"\w* shall be his: whatsoever any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, it shall be his.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, If \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* go \w aside|strong="H7847"\w*, and \w commit|strong="H4603"\w* a \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* against him,

And a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with her \w carnally|strong="H7902"\w*, and it be \w hid|strong="H5956"\w* from the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, and be kept \w close|strong="H5641"\w*, and she be \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, and \add there be\add* no \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* against her, neither she be \w taken|strong="H8610"\w* \add with the manner;\add*

And the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \w come|strong="H5674"\w* upon him, and he be \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* of his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and she be \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*: or if the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \w come|strong="H5674"\w* upon him, and he be \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* of his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and she be not \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*:

Then shall the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* her \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* for her, the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \add part\add* of an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w meal|strong="H7058"\w*; he shall \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* no \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* upon it, nor \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* thereon; for it \add is\add* an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*, an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w*, \w bringing|strong="H2142"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* to \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w*.
And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall bring her \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5975"\w* her \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* in an \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*; and of the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* that is in the \w floor|strong="H7172"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* into the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w set|strong="H5975"\w* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w uncover|strong="H6544"\w* the \w woman’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* in her \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, which \add is\add* the \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall have in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* that causeth the \w curse|strong="H0779"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall charge her by an \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, If no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* have \w lain|strong="H7901"\w* with thee, and if thou hast not gone \w aside|strong="H7847"\w* to \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* \add with another\add* instead of thy \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, be thou \w free|strong="H5352"\w* from this \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* that causeth the \w curse|strong="H0779"\w*:\f + \fr 5.19 \ft with another…: or, being in the power of thy husband: Heb. under thy husband\f*

But if thou hast gone \w aside|strong="H7847"\w* \add to another\add* instead of thy \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, and if thou be \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, and some \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w lain|strong="H7903"\w* with thee \w beside|strong="H1107"\w* thine \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*:

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w charge|strong="H7650"\w* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* with an \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* of \w cursing|strong="H0423"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w curse|strong="H0423"\w* and an \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* doth \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* to \w rot|strong="H5307"\w*, and thy \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* to \w swell|strong="H6639"\w*;  +  r 5.21  t rot: Heb. fall *

And this \w water|strong="H4325"\w* that causeth the \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* shall \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into thy \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w*, to make \add thy\add* \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* to \w swell|strong="H6638"\w*, and \add thy\add* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* to \w rot|strong="H5307"\w*: And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*, \w amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w write|strong="H3789"\w* these \w curses|strong="H0423"\w* in a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, and he shall \w blot|strong="H4229"\w* \add them\add* out with the \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*:

And he shall cause the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* the \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* that causeth the \w curse|strong="H0779"\w*: and the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* that causeth the \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into her, \add and become\add* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w*.

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* out of the \w woman’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and shall \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* the \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* it upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall take an \w handful|strong="H7061"\w* of the \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \add even\add* the \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* thereof, and \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* shall cause the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

And when he hath made her to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, then it shall come to pass, \add that\add*, if she be \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, and have \w done|strong="H4603"\w* \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* against her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, that the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* that causeth the \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into her, \add and become\add* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w*, and her \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* shall \w swell|strong="H6638"\w*, and her \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* shall \w rot|strong="H5307"\w*: and the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* shall be a \w curse|strong="H0423"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* her \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And if the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* be not \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, but be \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*; then she shall be \w free|strong="H5352"\w*, and shall \w conceive|strong="H2232"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w jealousies|strong="H7068"\w*, when a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* goeth \w aside|strong="H7847"\w* \add to another\add* instead of her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, and is \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*;

Or when the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \w cometh|strong="H5674"\w* upon \w him|strong="H0376"\w*, and he be \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* over his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and shall \w set|strong="H5975"\w* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* upon her all this \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

Then shall the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* be \w guiltless|strong="H5352"\w* from \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* her \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.
